channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Alpine A390 ou Porsche Macan électrique : on compare ces deux voitures ultra performantes
item.description: Alpine vient tout juste de présenter le plus grand véhicule de son histoire avec l'A390, une voiture électrique avec pas moins de trois moteurs. Il s'attaque de front au Porsche Macan, un SUV clairement assumé et qui est récemment passé au 100 % électrique.

item.title: Apple's AirPods Pro 3 drop to a new record low of $199
item.description:
No need to fret if you missed out on some of the best Black Friday deals this year — some of them have returned already. Case in point: Apple's AirPods Pro 3, which came out in September this year, are on sale for a new record low of $199. That's 20 percent off and better than the discount we saw during Black Friday and Cyber Monday. With the new AirPods Pro, Apple made some big improvements, including better battery life and sound quality, and introduced useful new features, such as Live Translation.
The AirPods Pro 3 are the best AirPods available today, with Apple's H2 chip, and earned a ...

item.title: Cette récente montre connectée avec plus de 10 jours d’autonomie connait sa première baisse de prix intéressante sur Amazon
item.description: Loin derrière les prix des Garmin, Polar et autres montres sportives premium, l'Amazfit Balance 2 nous a bluffés lors de notre prise en main. Sur Amazon, elle entame même ses premières baisses de prix et passe à 269 euros au lieu de 299 euros.

item.title: HPC and AI converging infrastructures
item.description: The modern data center is undergoing a significant transformation driven by increasing complexity and widespread integration of artificial intelligence.

item.title: Disney signs deal with OpenAI to allow Sora to generate AI videos featuring its characters
item.description: Disney says that alongside the agreement, it will "become a major customer of OpenAI," as it will use its APIs to build new products, tools, and experiences, including for Disney+.

item.title: Against the Federal Moratorium on State-Level Regulation of AI
item.description: The common refrain that a patchwork of regulations would kill innovation doesn't pass the smell test.

item.title: Oracle shares drop after $15bn higher AI spending revealed
item.description: Oracle investors aren't happy with higher-than-anticipated Capex, despite healthy revenue growth.

item.title: « Ça permet de voir la peau de quelqu’un plus en détail ? » : Donald Trump parle de la 6G sans avoir la moindre idée de ce dont il s’agit
item.description: Lors d'une réunion filmée, le président des États-Unis s'est mis à parler de la 6G sans savoir ce que c'est. La preuve en images.

item.title: Alerte rouge sur Google Chrome : une mystérieuse faille de sécurité est exploitée par des pirates
item.description: Google vient de déployer une mise à jour d’urgence de Chrome. Le correctif vise à colmater une faille de sécurité déjà exploitée par des cybercriminels. L'éditeur n'a pas communiqué beaucoup d'informations sur la vulnérabilité par mesure de précaution.

item.title: Over 200,000 power banks sold on Amazon are being recalled for a fire risk
item.description: A company called INIU has issued a recall for its BI-B41 10,000mAh power banks because the lithium-ion batteries they use "can overheat and ignite, posing fire and burn hazards to consumers." The company has received 15 reports of the power banks overheating resulting in 11 fires causing over $380,000 in property damage and three minor […]

item.title: On Me raises $6M to shake up the gift card industry
item.description: On Me raises $6 million for its digital gift card platform that lets users purchase cards categorized by interests rather than being restricted to specific retailers.

item.title: Quantifying the hidden costs of cloud sovereignty gaps
item.description: Recent outages are symptoms of an over-reliance on US based hyperscalers.

item.title: Disney’s AI Slop Era Is Here
item.description: The studio has announced a landmark deal and $1 billion investment with OpenAI to bring hundreds of Disney characters to its generative AI platforms.

item.title: AT&T’s Connected Life Platform Is a Second Try in the Smart-Home Space
item.description: The carrier’s Connected Life platform, now available nationwide, lets AT&T customers easily set up a smart-home security system.

item.title: AT&T’s new home security system is powered by Google Home and Abode
item.description: AT&T is launching Connected Life, a new smart home security offering built around Google Home that keeps working during power or internet outages. Connected Life can be self-installed and features smart home cameras from Google Nest and security hardware from Abode, as well as professional monitoring. This follows Google launching APIs for its smart home […]...

item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Friday, December 12 (game #915)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Plus de 100 marques chinoises de voitures électriques mais seulement 3 sont rentables : voici lesquelles
item.description: En Chine, il existe plus de 100 constructeurs automobile de voitures électriques. Mais seulement 3 d'entre eux sont rentables à l'heure actuelle. Voici lesquels.

item.title: Séisme dans le monde de l’IA : ChatGPT obtient les droits sur 200 personnages Disney
item.description: C'est un grand coup que vient de marquer OpenAI dans le monde de l'IA. La firme a signé un accord historique avec Disney pour avoir accès à 200 personnages du géant du cinéma.

item.title: MCON Review: You Won’t Find a More Compact Mobile Controller
item.description: Despite slighly odd ergonomics, the MCON will turn your phone into the handheld you want it to be.

item.title: Voici les 3 voitures électriques les plus vendues au monde : deux Tesla et une Chinoise qui arrive bientôt en Europe
item.description: Avec un bond de 32 % des ventes de voitures électriques au 3e trimestre 2025, une nouvelle hiérarchie émerge : BYD conforte sa première place et Geely s'impose en troisième position. Bien que défié par la concurrence chinoise, Tesla résiste solidement et place son Model Y à la tête des ventes.

item.title: Best Buy has a massive end-of-year sale on its best-selling TVs — cheap 4K TVs from $59.99
item.description: Best Buy's massive end-of-year TV sale is live, and I'm rounding up the best deals on 4K, QLED, and OLED TVs, with clearance prices starting at $59.99.

item.title: OpenAI signs deal to bring Disney characters to Sora and ChatGPT
item.description: It looks like Disney wasted no time delivering on CEO Bob Iger’s promise to bring AI-generated content to Disney+. On Thursday, the company announced the start of a three-year licensing agreement with OpenAI to bring more than 200 of its beloved characters, including those from Star Wars and Pixar, to the Sora app and ChatGPT. With the deal in place, OpenAI users will be able to prompt ChatGPT to generate images that tap into Disney’s intellectual property, with costumes, props, vehicles and environments covered. The agreement does not include voices or “talent likenesses,” meaning Sora users...

item.title: Appels d’urgence : Google active la vidéo en direct sur Android pour rattraper l’iPhone
item.description: Google déploie enfin la vidéo en direct pour les appels d'urgence sur Android. Une fonction vitale pour guider les secours, mais pas encore disponible en France.

item.title: The kid-friendly console that outsold Xbox during Black Friday is $50 off
item.description: The Nex Playground is a motion-controlled, cube-shaped console for ages five and up that’s selling like hotcakes. It came in third for home console sales during Black Friday week, according to sales data shared on Bluesky from Mat Piscatella of Circana, falling behind only Nintendo’s Switch 2 and Sony’s PlayStation 5. That’s an impressive feat […]

item.title: Philips Hue : comment bien débuter avec ces ampoules connectées ?
item.description: Vous avez envie d'équiper votre maison avec un éclairage intelligent ? Philips propose avec sa gamme Hue la plus grande gamme d'ampoules connectées. Comment choisir ses ampoules connectées Philips Hue et comment bien débuter ? Retrouvez les meilleurs kits de démarrage Philips Hue ainsi que nos explications.

item.title: TIME names ‘Architects of AI’ its Person of the Year
item.description: TIME Magazine has named the 'Architects of AI' its Person of the Year, who include Jensen Huang, Elon Musk, Sam Altman, Mark Zuckerberg, Lisa Su, Dario Amodei, Demis Hassabis, and Fei-Fei Li

item.title: Coca-Cola announces its new CEO, company veteran Henrique Braun
item.description: Henrique Braun, who has worked at Coca-Cola for three decades, will take over as CEO on March 31, 2026. Coca-Cola said Wednesday that its chief operating officer will become its next CEO in the first quarter of 2026.The Atlanta beverage giant said its board elected Henrique Braun as CEO effective March 31. James Quincey, Coke’s current chairman and CEO, will transition to executive chairman of the company.Braun, 57, has worked at Coca-Cola for three decades. Prior to assuming the COO role earlier this year, he led operations in Brazil, Latin America, Greater China and South Korea. He has held...

item.title: 6 Best Smart Christmas Lights (2025): Twinkly, Govee, Cync
item.description: Control these smart lights with a voice command or a tap on your phone. Now that’s a Christmas miracle.

item.title: OpenAI’s billion-dollar Disney deal puts Mickey Mouse and Marvel in Sora
item.description: A new three-year licensing agreement announced between Disney and ChatGPT operator OpenAI will allow the Sora video generator to create "user-prompted social videos" that feature more than 200 characters from Disney, Marvel, Pixar, and Star Wars. "The rapid advancement of artificial intelligence marks an important moment for our industry, and through this collaboration with OpenAI […]...

item.title: Regardez bien la Une du Time 2025 : deux absences majeures en disent long sur l’état de la Tech
item.description: Le magazine Time a choisi sa « personne de l'année » et en 2025, le magazine dédie le prix aux architectes de l'IA. Microsoft et Apple sont notoirement absents.

item.title: Hackers distribute thousands of phishing attacks through Mimecast's secure-link feature
item.description: A legitimate feature is being abused to hide phishing emails and have them land in inboxes.

item.title: Xiaomi casse déjà le prix de son nouveau smartphone haut de gamme, le surpuissant Poco F8 Ultra
item.description: Alors qu'il vient à peine d'être lancé, le Xiaomi Poco F8 Ultra s'offre déjà une baisse drastique de prix sur le site officiel de la marque, avec une première remise immédiate de 200 euros et une deuxième de 50 euros via un coupon, passant de 899 euros à 649 euros.

item.title: Open AI poaches Slack CEO as its chief revenue officer
item.description: Slack's CEO has just moved over to a new role in OpenAI, but it's not as CEO.

item.title: Online safety debate: peer claims kids' VPNs 'expose devices to viruses'
item.description: A Lib Dem peer has raised concerns about unsafe VPN apps in a debate in the House of Lords.

item.title: The Third ’28 Years Later’ Movie Is Actually Happening
item.description: Danny Boyle directs, Alex Garland writes, and Cillian Murphy is likely to star.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 5.5 launch: our live coverage of the Rogue update, including downtime and release date
item.description: Here's our coverage of the launch of Marvel Rivals Season 5.5 as it happens. This includes a look at the release date, and the new Hero Rogue.

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make your choice.

item.title: Unapologetically crass and filled with Gen Z slang — why this Prime Video anime is my latest obsession
item.description: New Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt is a Prime Video anime that should be at the top of your watch list.

item.title: WiiM just unveiled the ultimate Sonos Era 100 rival — meet the hi-res Sound Lite
item.description: The WiiM Sound Lite is a stylish hi-res smart speaker for whole-home audio

item.title: How to watch Luke Littler at the 2026 PDC World Darts Championship online: FREE darts live streams, schedule
item.description: Luke Littler defends his title at Ally Pally, here's how to watch the Nuke at the 2026 World Darts Championship live streams online from anywhere in the world.

item.title: The goverment is vibe coding now
item.description: Figma is bringing its AI prototyping tool, Figma Make, to U.S. government agencies. Vibe coding has come to Washington.

item.title: What the Fed’s rate cut means for your mortgage, credit cards, and more
item.description: The Federal Reserve slashed its key rate to nearly 3.6%, the lowest in almost three years. The Federal Reserve cut its benchmark interest rate by a quarter point Wednesday for the third time since September, bringing its key rate to about 3.6%, the lowest in nearly three years. Before September, it had gone nine months without a cut.The benchmark rate is the rate at which banks borrow and lend to one another, and the Fed has two goals when it sets the rate: one, to manage prices for goods and services, and two, to encourage full employment. The benchmark rate also affects the interest rates co...

item.title: The DJI Power 2000 portable power station is down to its lowest-ever price — almost half off
item.description: The DJI Power 2000 is on sale at Amazon for $699, down from the list price of $1,299. That's a 46% discount.

item.title: Gemini Space Station stock price skyrockets as Winklevoss crypto firm wins prediction market approval
item.description: With platforms like Kalshi and Polymarket gaining in popularity, Gemini Titan will offer users contracts as yes-or-no questions about future events. Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss are taking Gemini Space Station Inc. into the prediction market space.

item.title: Xiaomi a sorti l’écran parfait pour combiner gaming et travail
item.description: Xiaomi enrichit son catalogue avec un nouvel écran PC, le Monitor A27i 2026. Ce moniteur de 27 pouces en Full HD joue la carte de la polyvalence, promettant une fluidité de 144 Hz et une excellente calibration d’usine pour séduire aussi bien les travailleurs de jour que les joueurs du soir. Sans OLED ni HDR, il vise surtout l’entrée de gamme efficace, à mi-chemin entre bureautique et gaming....

item.title: Security flaws in Freedom Chat app exposed users’ phone numbers and PINs
item.description: The founder of Freedom Chat said the company has reset user PINs and released a new version to app stores.

item.title: Zeekr 007 GT : on a essayé le break électrique chinois de 646 ch qui arrive en Europe et qui veut faire de l’ombre à l’Audi E5
item.description: On a eu la chance d'essayer la nouvelle Zeekr 007 GT. Une voiture électrique chinoise prévue pour l'Europe, qui se recharge en 10 minutes et dotée de 646 ch. Voici notre premier avis.
